pages.text:
Activities & Special Events
.page-header
The activity calendar for Water’s Edge RV Resort is typical of that found in many RV parks. There is something for everyone including line dance classes, Monday golf league, water aerobics, game night and bingo, just to name a few…our latest additions include Bocce and Corn Hole   The last Tuesday of each month beginning in November and continuing through March is a 9 A.M. Camper Coffee (free coffee and donuts). The next month’s Activities Calendar is distributed and discussed. Our newsletter is available from the menu tab.
Regular weekly events during the “season” – November through March
Golf
Water Aerobics
Game Nights
Bingo
Line Dancing
Bocce
Corn Hole
A sampling of Special Events
Thanksgiving Dinner
Christmas Dinner
New Year’s Eve Gathering
Valentine Dinner &
Super Bowl Party
Mardi Gras Parade
St Patrick’s Dinner
Pool Parties
There are also many organized trips including dinner theater, ladies’ luncheons, fishing and casino trips and cruises. Again, there is something for everyone! We don’t let any opportunity go by without organizing something! Don’t miss the fun.

Contact Us
.page-header
Water’s
Edge RV Resort can be contacted via any of the following sources:
Local Telephone:
(941) 637.4677
Nationwide Toll-Free:
(800) 637.9224
FAX: (
941) 637.9543
Email: office@watersedgervresort.com
All reservations
must be made via telephone.
For general information, you may complete and submit the following form. Please allow 24-48 hours for a response to your form inquiry.
[contact-form-7 id=”178″ title=”Waters Edge RV Resort Website Inquiry”]
